title: Jonas Vingegaard Pulls Out of Paris-Nice: What It Means for His Tour de France Showdown with Pogačar
content:
'It is best for him to recover at home': Visma-Lease a Bike is relieved because a serious fracture would have forced him off the bike for weeks.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Pulls Out of Paris-Nice: What It Means for His Tour de France Showdown with Pogačar on Velo.
author: ahood
